document.docAuthor: Yang, Mao-Fa, Meng, Ze-Hong & Li, Zi-Zhong
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic study on the leafhopper genus Cofana Melichar (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Cicadellinae) from China, with description of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic study on the leafhopper genus Cofana Melichar (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Cicadellinae) from China, with description of two new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tettigonia unimaculata Signoret, 1854
, Soc. Ent. de France Ann. 2 ( 3 ): 26 .

Tettigonia punctum Taschenberg, 1884
, Zur Kenntniss der Cicadellinen-Gattung
Tettigonia Geoffr. Ztsschr.
f. Naturw, 57 : 445 .
Kolla mimica
Distant, 1908
, Faun. Brit. Ind. Rhyn., 4 : 225 .

Kolla tripunctifrons Banks, 1910
, Philippine Jour. Sci. 5 : 51 .

Tettigoniella differentialis Baker , 1914
, Philippine Jour. Sci. 9 : 420 .

Tettigoniella hopinensis
Distant, 1918
, Faun. Brit. Ind. Rhyn., 7 : 3 .

Deltocephalus trimaculatus
Distant, 1918
, Faun. Brit. Ind. Rhyn., 7 : 83 .

Tettigoniella differentialis Baker
:
Kuoh, 1966
, Economic Insect Fauna of China , Fasc. 10 , Homoptera: Cicadellidae : 58 .
Cofana unimaculata (Signoret)
:
Young, 1979
, Proc. Entomol. Soc. Wash., 81 ( 1 ): 7 .
Cofana karjatensis
Ramakrishnan, 1985
, Journal of Entomological research, 9 : 129 .
Cofana karachiensis
Ara & Ahmed, 1988
, Pakistan Journal of Zoology, 20 : 290 .
